title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features a clean design, dark/light theme toggle, and smooth animations. The site showcases my projects, skills, and experience in an interactive way.
features: Fully responsive design that works on all devices
Dark/light theme toggle with system preference detection
Accessible markup with proper ARIA attributes
Optimized performance with lazy loading images

title: E-commerce Analytics Dashboard
description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard for e-commerce businesses. This application provides real-time insights into sales, customer behavior, and inventory management with interactive charts and data visualization.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application that helps teams organize and track their work. Features include task assignments, due dates, priority levels, and real-time updates.

title: Recipe Finder App
description: A recipe discovery application that helps users find recipes based on ingredients they have. The app includes nutritional information, step-by-step instructions, and the ability to save favorite recipes.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: A weather application that provides current weather conditions and forecasts. The app features a clean, intuitive interface with detailed weather data and beautiful weather animations.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A mobile-first fitness tracking application that helps users log workouts, track progress, and set fitness goals. The app includes exercise demonstrations and progress analytics.

title: Headless Blog Platform
description: A headless CMS for bloggers with a focus on performance and developer experience. The platform includes a React frontend and a Node.js backend with a rich text editor and media management.

title: AI Chatbot
description: An AI-powered chatbot that can answer questions, provide recommendations, and assist with common tasks. The bot uses natural language processing to understand and respond to user queries.

title: Expense Tracker
description: A simple yet powerful expense tracking application that helps users monitor their spending, set budgets, and analyze their financial habits.

title: Restaurant Website
description: A modern, responsive website for a local restaurant. The site features an online menu, reservation system, and gallery of the restaurant's dishes and ambiance.

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: A dashboard that aggregates metrics and analytics from multiple social media platforms, providing insights into audience engagement and content performance.

title: Job Board Platform
description: A platform connecting job seekers with employers. Features include job postings, resume uploads, and an advanced search system to match candidates with relevant positions.
